column1: FROM lumo.crm_party, lumo.nc_client, lumo.crm_element_hierarchy, lumo.contacts AS _contacts WHERE nc_client.seq_party_id = crm_party.seq_party_id AND crm_element_hierarchy.element_id = crm_party.seq_party_id AND crm_element_hierarchy.seq_element_type_id = '8' AND _contacts.RC = '1' AND _contacts.parent_id = nc_client.seq_party_id
